item.title: Add Gaps to Your Linux Workspace
item.description: First of all, let’s answer the most important question, “Why”?.. It’s for aesthetic purposes. I find it nice to have the wallpaper -partially- visible on my workspace. Here’s my current desktop with workspace gaps on the top, right and the bottom of the screen. Known Solutions There are extensions that trying to provide this feature. For example, there is Useless Gaps for GNOME Shell and Maximized Window Gap for KDE Plasma which is I’m currently maintaining that.
